transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello? Yes.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, yes.
Customer: Nagendra bol raha tha Dhanvantri Handicraft se.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir, namaskar. Bataiye kaise hain sir aap, theek hain?
Customer: Namaskar, badhiya hoon. Main ye keh raha tha ki jo hamara, hamari jo, hamare pe jo hai preferred, hamare pe leader chal raha hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Jo leader chal raha hai, jaise koi customer search karta hai merit mein, to hamare pe only TrustSeal likha hua aata hai.
Customer: Kya likh kar kya raha hai? Leader nahi likh kar ke aa raha hai?
Customer: Leader likh ke nahi aa raha hai?
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: A, ek meri, meri aapke senior se baat hui thi, Anam mam ka, Raviuallah kya naam hai. Unse meri baat hui thi.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Haan, haan. Ki jo fake jo review pade hain, unhone kaha tha ki main inko remove kara dunga. Unka bhi nahi hua kuch bhi.
Executive: Ek kaam karta hoon, kal aap mujhe samay de payenge 10 minute ka?
Customer: Haan, haan, bilkul de deta hoon.
Executive: To kal aap mujhe bata do main kis samay aapko phone karun? To kal main aap ek meeting main schedule karunga to usme main ek baar sab sari cheeze dekh kar ke main sara kaam line direct karwaunga.
Customer: Aap 11 baje ki, 11 baje ki schedule kara lo aur ek ye bhi jo mera main concern hai wo ye hai ki jo mere page pe wo jo leader likha hua nahi aa raha hai aisa kyun?
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Bilkul, haan ji. To kal main 11 baje schedule kar deta hoon meeting, kal hum baith kar ke isme sara kaam line kar ke turant kar denge, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai sir, theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leader is not showing on the page.

- Fake reviews not removed yet.



Resolution:

- Meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 11 AM.

- Executive will look into the issues.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leader, trustseal, fake reviews, meeting
